name: Catto Boi: Journey to Catto Land
name_original: Catto Boi: Journey to Catto Land
description:
Catto Boi is called upon to travel to the fabled Catto Land!
But as he gets there, he falls asleep and has a dream...
Warning: This game is not suitable for children under the age of 16 or those who are easily disturbed.
Check out the fourth game!
